markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Senghor Sailor](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=99)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 94 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Mwangi Expanse

</column>

As an experienced sailor from Senghor, you know that the only thing saving you from disaster on the high seas is a properly maintained ship. You know boat-building inside and out and you can quickly cobble together a solution in the event that something breaks.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Intelligence
or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) skill, and the [Sailing Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Quick Repair](/Feats.aspx?ID=827) skill feat.
name: Senghor Sailor

text: Senghor Sailor Source World Guide pg. 94 2.0 Region Mwangi Expanse As an experienced sailor from Senghor, you know that the only thing saving you from disaster on the high seas is a properly maintained ship. You know boat-building inside and out and you can quickly cobble together a solution in the event that something breaks. Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Intelligence or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in the Crafting skill, and the Sailing Lore skill. You gain the Quick Repair skill feat.
